hymn.title: Not by wrestling, but by clinging

layout.singingstanza: Not by wrest -- ling, but by cling -- ing Shall we be most blest; Wrest -- ling on -- ly brings us sor -- row; Cling -- ing brings us rest.

lyrics.stanza: When we stay our feeble efforts, And from struggling cease, Unconditional surrender Brings us God's own peace.
Lean we all our weight on Jesus, Who alone can save; He by might of love hath triumphed O'er His willing slave.
